tips.tip: Make sure you have learnt to use Emacs' online documentation available as hypertext info pages.

tip.title: Opening info page that documents command on a given key

tips.tip: Use C-h C-k and then press the key whose documentation you wish to lookup.

Files and folders are best managed using Emacs' dired mode invoked by dired. Files and folders matching a specific selection criterion can be located using either find-dired and friends, or more efficiently via locate and locate-with-filter. All of these commands present a directory listing of the selected files and folders with the same browsing interface; see the Emacs online info pages for dired.
